sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_mab_api.MobileUXThemeService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MobileUXThemeService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MobileUXThemeService = Class.create();
MobileUXThemeService.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {},

    type: "MobileUXThemeService",

    getMobileUXThemes: function (mobileThemeIds) {
        var result = [];
        mobileThemeIds.forEach(function (mobileThemeId) {
            var uxThemesGr = new GlideRecord("sys_ux_theme");
            uxThemesGr.get(mobileThemeId);
            if (uxThemesGr.isValid()) {
                result.push({
                    id: mobileThemeId,
                    label: uxThemesGr.getDisplayValue(),
                });
            }
        });
        return result;
    },
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-05-22 17:16:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2a94add843c32110e9af1f6ffab8f29a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MobileUXThemeService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile App Builder API" source="sn_mab_api">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Mobile App Builder API">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2a94add843c32110e9af1f6ffab8f29a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-05-22 17:16:26</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
